SEARCH
Package com.iantapply.wynncraft.database

Class DatabaseHelpers

java.lang.Object
com.iantapply.wynncraft.database.DatabaseHelpers
public class DatabaseHelpers extends Object
A collection of helper methods for database related tasks including but not limited to building URLs, finishing queries, and interacting with tables

Note: All warning in regard to unsafe SQL statements can be ignored, we are sanitizing our queries before execution and none of the helpers are faced towards the consumers.

      Builds a database URL from the given database information

      Returns:
      The built URL as a string

    • buildDatabaseUrl

      public static String buildDatabaseUrl(DatabaseInformation databaseInformation, boolean fallbackDatabase)
      Builds a database URL from the given database information and a flag of if the database is the fallback database.
      Parameters:
      databaseInformation - The information to build the URL from
      fallbackDatabase - Whether the database is the fallback database
      Returns:
      The built URL as a string

    • finishQueryWithoutResult

      public static void finishQueryWithoutResult(PreparedStatement queryStatement)
      Finishes a query by executing the statement and closing it without returning a result
      Parameters:
      queryStatement - The statement to finish

    • finishQuery

      public static String[] finishQuery(PreparedStatement queryStatement) throws SQLException
      Finishes a query by executing the statement and closing it
      Parameters:
      queryStatement - The statement to finish
      Returns:
      The result of the query. An empty array if there is an SQL error that occurs
      Throws:
      SQLException - Throws an SQL exception if it can't execute the query because of a DB issue or SQL issue

    • executeQuery

      public static void executeQuery(String databaseClassName, String query)
      Executes a query on the provided database name and with the provided query
      Parameters:
      databaseClassName - The name of the Java class that appears in the database subfolder. This is the name of the class itself, not the name of the physical database as there can be duplicates.
      query - The query that is executed on the specified database

      Parameters:

      database - The name of the database to create.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • insertRow

      public static void insertRow(Connection connection, String table, String[] columns, Object[] values) throws SQLException
      Inserts a row into a table with the given columns and values.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The name of the table to insert the row into.
      columns - The columns to insert the values into.
      values - The values to insert into the columns.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • updateRow

      public static void updateRow(Connection connection, String table, String[] columns, Object[] values, String condition, Object... conditionValues) throws SQLException
      Updates a row in a table with the given columns and values.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to update the row in.
      columns - The columns to update.
      values - The values to update the columns with.
      condition - The condition to check for when updating a row (e.g., "id = ?").
      conditionValues - The values to bind to the condition's placeholders.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • deleteRow

      public static void deleteRow(Connection connection, String table, String condition, Object... conditionValues) throws SQLException
      Deletes a row from a table with the given condition.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to delete the row from.
      condition - The condition to check for when deleting a row (e.g., "id = ?").
      conditionValues - The values to bind to the condition's placeholders.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

      Creates a table with the given columns and types.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The name of the table to create.
      columns - The ArrayList of Column objects containing column definitions.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • checkTableExists

      public static boolean checkTableExists(Connection connection, String table) throws SQLException
      Checks if a table exists in a database connection
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection
      table - The name of the table to check for existence
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the table exists. Returns false upon SQL error.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Throws an SQL exception if it can't execute the query because of a DB issue or SQL issue

    • selectRow

      public static String[] selectRow(Connection connection, String table, String condition, Object... conditionValues) throws SQLException
      Selects an entire row from a table with the given condition.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to select the row from.
      condition - The condition to check for when selecting a row (e.g., "uuid = ?").
      conditionValues - The values to bind to the condition's placeholders.
      Returns:
      The row's data in a String array, or null if no row is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • selectRowWithLatestCreatedAt

      public static String[] selectRowWithLatestCreatedAt(Connection connection, String table, String condition, Object... conditionValues) throws SQLException
      Selects an entire and latest row from a table with the given condition.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to select the row from.
      condition - The condition to check for when selecting a row (e.g., "uuid = ?").
      conditionValues - The values to bind to the condition's placeholders.
      Returns:
      The row's data in a String array, or null if no row is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • createColumn

      public static void createColumn(Connection connection, String table, String column, String type) throws SQLException
      Creates a column in a table with the given type.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to create the column in.
      column - The name of the column to create.
      type - The type of the column to create (e.g., "INT", "VARCHAR(255)").
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • checkColumnExists

      public static boolean checkColumnExists(Connection connection, String table, String column) throws SQLException
      Checks if a column in a table exists and returns a boolean
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use
      table - The name of the table that the column appears in
      column - The name of the column to search for
      Returns:
      Whether the column exists as a boolean. Returns false upon SQL error
      Throws:
      SQLException - Throws an SQL exception if it can't execute the query because of a DB issue or SQL issue

    • createColumn

      public static void createColumn(Connection connection, String table, String column, String type, String defaultValue) throws SQLException
      Creates a column in a table with the given type and default value.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection to use.
      table - The table to create the column in.
      column - The name of the column to create.
      type - The type of the column to create (e.g., "INT", "VARCHAR(255)").
      defaultValue - The default value that should be inserted in the column.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.
